publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-2018 Nicola Sturgeon: Public Health Etc. (Scotland) Bill—That the Parliament agrees that the Public Health etc. (Scotland) Bill be passed. Supported by: Shona Robison*, Stewart Maxwell*
